• Sterling Silver Jewelry
• Rose Gold Plated

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
This elegant jewelry banner is divided into soft pastel quadrants, anchored by a centered product image of wreath-style earrings, positioned slightly to the right. The top-left quadrant features three stacked text layers: a bold brand name (`heading`), a serif subheading highlighting the collection (`subheading`), and a compact tagline in all caps (`tagline`). Below this is a metal quality descriptor (`description`). On the bottom-left quadrant is a detailed feature list (`features`), followed by a standout pricing element in bold (`price`) and a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with contrasting white text (`cta`). The overall layout preserves visual harmony through elegant typography and organic spacing.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Rose Pink: `#FCE4E7`
- Light Blush: `#FFF5F6`
- Muted Rose Gold: `#C06363`
- Accent Crimson: `#D88C8C`
- Soft Grey: `#777777`
- Warm Brown: `#5E2323`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings that blend soft rose gold and sparkling diamond-like stones. The primary color palette includes a romantic **Rose Gold (#F7C6C7)** for the metal framework and floral elements, paired with a pure **Crystal White (#FFFFFF)** in the round and marquise-cut stones to create radiant contrast. Subtle gradients in the rose gold areas enhance depth, seamlessly blending with the brilliance of the white stones while maintaining distinction. The soft pink tones are highlighted with glistening reflections, creating a luxurious yet delicate aesthetic. Accent tones like **Blush Pink (#FADADD)** and **Silver Sparkle (#D8D8D8)** enhance dimension.
